products.title: Harper Chrome Roman Blind
products.description: Their harper range comes in several soft, almost metallic, shades with a light leafy, fern pattern. Product id: db-rom0945 fabric colour: chrome material: 54% polyester / 46% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes harper chrome roman blind in grey.

products.title: Harper Burnt Orange - Roman Blind
products.description: This beautiful array of shades is the perfect tonic if you're shopping for some vibrant and zesty roman blinds that will bring your interior to life. A welcome sense of calm is introduced by the shades of grey and light blue that really help set the tone. The living room will transform itself into the heart of the home when you pair this offering from the harper range with some light blue walls and a selection of orange and yellow accessories.
